column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This was a first visit for us
column2: and the place didn't disappoint.  We didn't have a ton of time
column3: so we kept to the more well-known exhibits:  Renoir
column7: Seurat.  Seeing some of these up close was somewhat of a surreal experience.  Experiencing the "pointillism" in Seurat's "A Sunday on La Grande Jatte" was worth the trip in itself.
